name: market for manual dismantling of used electric passenger car | manual dismantling of used electric passenger car | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7482/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'manual dismantling of used electric passenger car', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is delivering the service of treatment of a used electric passenger car with manual dismantling . One unit of this infrastructure treats of 1 kg of car, that represents a compact size car of approximately 1,200kg without considering the mass of the battery.

This activity starts with the service generation.


This activity ends with the service supplied to its consumers. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery
